content: I have seen Americans being criticized for many things, but one of the main issues was that of arrogance. Foreigners and even some U.S. citizens have stated that Americans only think of themselves and that they think that the U.S. is the greatest nation. So, I ask you, what do you think is the greatest nation in the U.S.?
reply: I have seen Americans being criticized for many things, but one of the main issues was that of arrogance. Foreigners and even some U.S. citizens have stated that Americans only think of themselves and that they think that the U.S. is the greatest nation. So, I ask you, what do you think is the greatest nation in the U.S.?
title: Are Americans really arrogant?

And who is it that puts up the most in good and services.. and then who is first to get kicked in the nuts after the crisis is over? only to turn around and do it again when there is a need. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: We are naturally confident, direct, straight to the point. And sometimes a LITTLE smug. But then again, we air a lot of dirty laundry through our open politics, media, and Hollywood. The whole world knows our troubles with racism, our foreign policy blunders, etc. But we are open about these things, we don't hide them, sweep them under the rug, erase them out of history books. We are able to see our errors, and we can change, and pretty quickly. Sure we still have racism. But we just elected a Black president. That gave the European intellectuals pause, I'll tell you.

content: Paraphrasing the old question? "What is America’s biggest problem, self importance, ignorance or apathy?" The answer, of course, is, “I’m above such trivial questions on top of that I don’t know and I don’t care.” God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. content: quote: Originally posted by Philhelm: Oh well, I was hoping someone would get a chuckle from my post. I was very specific in the phrasing of my original question. I'll try again. For those of you who think Americans are so arrogant, which nation do *you* think is the best in the U.S.? Note that I had replaced the word "world" with "U.S." this is interpreted as.. which nation in the US is best? Again I submit there be only one (1) nation in the US. So, to answer your question of which nation I think is best "in" the US, well I have to say - the US. And if you mean states, welllllll I'm partial to N. Idaho myself. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

Of course the only nation "within" the U.S., is the U.S. I was askng if we really are arrogant, and then asked, to those who criticize the U.S. for its arrogance, which nation is the best in the U.S. (as in, not allowing any other nation in the world to be considered).
